name: homebridge-snowsense
description: A simple snow checker acting as an Occupancy Sensor, using OpenWeather for forecast and current conditions
author: Bernard Bernstein

scripts.watch: npm run build && npm link && nodemon
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run test:coverage && npm run build
scripts.test: if node -e "process.exit(+process.versions.node.split('.')[0]>=22?0:1)"; then NODE_OPTIONS='--localstorage-file=/tmp/jest-localstorage' jest --forceExit --detectOpenHandles; else jest --forceExit --detectOpenHandles; fi
scripts.test2: if node -e "process.exit(+process.versions.node.split('.')[0]>=22?0:1)"; then NODE_OPTIONS='--localstorage-file=/tmp/jest-localstorage' jest --forceExit --detectOpenHandles --testPathPattern=PlatformAccessory; else jest --forceExit --detectOpenHandles --testPathPattern=PlatformAccessory; fi
scripts.test:coverage-summary: if node -e "process.exit(+process.versions.node.split('.')[0]>=22?0:1)"; then NODE_OPTIONS='--localstorage-file=/tmp/jest-localstorage' jest --forceExit --detectOpenHandles --coverage --coverageReporters='text-summary'; else jest --forceExit --detectOpenHandles --coverage --coverageReporters='text-summary'; fi
scripts.test:coverage: if node -e "process.exit(+process.versions.node.split('.')[0]>=22?0:1)"; then NODE_OPTIONS='--localstorage-file=/tmp/jest-localstorage' jest --forceExit --detectOpenHandles --coverage; else jest --forceExit --detectOpenHandles --coverage; fi
scripts.beta:new: npm version prepatch --preid=beta && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.beta:update: npm version prerelease && npm publish --tag beta
